name: Dungeon Gallery
description:
Actually started making a clicker, but as i wanted more dynamic gameplay added moment on the player and enemies so ended up in somenthing similar to a gallery shooter. 

Its the first time I made an action game in first person, hope you like it

Credits:

  • Art, design and coding: Me
  • Ultimate Sound FX Bundle on Unity AssetStore
  • Kyrise's 16x16 RPG Icon Pack (modified by me): https://kyrise.itch.io/
